alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 3:34PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Gulf, east central Bay, southwestern Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida and southwestern Liberty Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 415 PM EDT/315 PM CDT/... At 334 PM EDT/234 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles east of Callaway to Stonemill Creek. Movement was south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stonemill Creek, Wewahitchka, Chipola Cutoff and Honeyville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf
